name: UE 4.27 Simple Shooter Prototype
description:
What I learnt over the course:

  • Use of Unreal Engine 4.27.
  • Code in C++.
  • Use of blueprints and expose params using C++.
  • How to package the project to windows and other platforms. 
  • Animation blueprints.
  • Blendspaces.
  • UI (using widgets blueprints).
  • AI (using Behaviour Tree and Blackboards).
  • SFX and VFX.
